title: Critical Thinking Enhancement Strategies Through Virtual Education Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level foundational academic competencies and practical experience in the relevant field (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Blended learning format incorporating asynchronous discussions and weekly live sessions. Learners possess digital devices (tablets/laptops) and conduct job-linked case analyses

learning_goals: Learners can derive logically analyzed, evidence-based conclusions regarding diverse social issues
Learners systematically revise their arguments using peer feedback on online discussion platforms
Learners apply critical thinking strategies in real-world job scenarios using simulation tools provided in the LMS
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
